name: clangorous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
related to the continuous loud noise of something, especially something made of metal, being hit or rung: The clangorous sound filled the air and conversation was impossible. The clangorous warning bells are hard to miss. See
clangour
More examplesFewer examplesThe song is full of clangorous percussion.The composer's music uses loud drumming and clangorous brass. The pecking, chattering red-headed woodpecker is among the most clangorous creatures in the forest.
